text: anybody know how to pull information into email module from CRM Customer Object for personalized emails? like if this customer has this field as YES show, if not hide in email

Hi <@U065QC32M8W>. You will need <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-programmable-emails|Programmable emails> for this if I am not wrong. You switch it on in the module, and then insert the module in a template.
